name: VIP Tarot
description:
Welcome to VIP Tarot - a fun, friendly and strategic game with a social community. 

VIP Tarot is a trick-taking card game played with 4 players using a traditional 78-card tarot deck.

Start playing today and enjoy many benefits -

  • VIP Tarot can be played on Android, Facebook and on the web
  • Social environment - make new friends, customize your profile, upload pictures
  • Explore unique and various items that you can acquire or gift
  • Communicate with other players in the global chat
  • Compete in tournaments and become the best

Game website: https://viptarot.fr/en/
